ygData.subject: Re: Sword...
ygData.msgSnippet: The stats are pretty good. it is a powerful weapon, which also has magic attacks such as disease spell and siphon strength apparently... the problem is, Lord
ygData.messageBody:
The stats are pretty good. it is a powerful weapon, which also has magic
attacks such as disease spell and siphon strength apparently... the problem
is, Lord Grimrot is level 28ish when naked and sometimes with but normaslly
without the scythe, but when he's fully kitted up in his armor, he's level
32ish. One thing tho, he is a skelie so various harm undead spells would work
well against him. As an SK i was able to get up close and talk to him, and he
tried to tempt me into trying to kill him that i might win the weapon hehe.
